entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 6 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 6 this morning then rising. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
